messages.subject: Hands on Geometry
messages.msgSnippet: Thought this was quite cool. I am off to get some paper plates & bobby pins to start trying to make some myself, whether or not Dan joins in or not, I care not
messages.messageBody:
Thought this was quite cool. I am off to get some paper plates & bobby pins
to start trying to make some myself, whether or not Dan joins in or not, I
care not - I thought they were just beautiful!

Hey - thanks for everyone replies BTW to my other post (the 'newbie
unschooler' one).. I have been sick with flu this last week, and havn't had
energy to reply. I will get to it!

Bye
Hilary


Check out this wonderful gallery of geometric shapes...
http://www.wholemovement.com/gallery8.html

... then find out how to make some of them yourself (the more simple ones
anyway) from nothing but paper plates, bobby pins and masking tape!

http://www.wholemovement.com/howto.html





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
